basic_site.title: Simple <1></1> Website
basic_site.description: Perfect when you start your online business.

features.feature2: Home page with several subpages or the so-called One-Page Website, i.e. all content on one page

complex_site.title: Complex <1></1> Website
complex_site.description: The optimal solution when you need more than standard functionalities and greater personalization.

features.feature4: Additional functionalities, e.g. reservation system or advanced forms

features.feature1: Full integration with the online payment system

each_variant.title: Each variant
each_variant.feature1: Possibility to purchase ongoing technical support
each_variant.feature2: Possibility to purchase administration of your website

free_hour: One hour of free technical support
alert_message: Each project is optimized in terms of responsiveness (RWD), operational efficiency and maintaining standards for positioning (SEO) in search engines.
